Main.Intro: Select the PO lines that you wish to send to Adlib. You can page through the records in Alma and your selection will be remembered.
Main.Update: Update {count, plural, =0 {} other {{count}}} {count, plural, =1{PO Line} other{PO Lines}}
Main.NoRecords: This app allows you to create/update records in Adlib. Please navigate to a list of PO lines.
